Description:
BRIGHT AND COSY!
A perfect starter, investment or downsizing option is this warm and inviting home set in the prestigious Epping locale! Abundant in natural light this immediately move in or easy to rent out home opens onto a welcoming formal lounge, which flows through to a bright open-plan kitchen/meals area , free flowing into the fully decked undercover entertainment area. Three generous sized bedrooms, master with ENS and WIR, completes the appeal inside this stylish and relaxing home. A fantastic low maintenance grassed backyard and a double remote garage provides a superior level of convenience. Within walking distance to bus stops, multiple schools, childcare, shops and easy access to Epping Plaza and Northern Hospital. Modern comforts offer ducted heating, cooling, s/s appliances including D/W, plenty of storage and bench space!
This beautiful home is a must see for the savvy purchaser.
Estimated rental return $390-$410 PW.
Insights: 6 Daybreak Street, Epping VIC 3076 was last sold in 2018 and 152 other 3 bedroom house in Epping have recently been sold.

Description:
Great To Rent Out, Even Better To Live In.
Comfortable contemporary living or incredible rental opportunities are possibilities available to the lucky buyer of this stylishly renovated three-bedroom home once the hammer comes down and the Auctioneer yells 'Sold!'
With the green expanses of Peppercorn Park and the scenic Darebin Creek Trail just metres away, you can step out into natural surrounds and calm your mind with a brisk early morning walk, sunset jog or weekend bike ride. And with seamless access to Epping Secondary College, St Monica's College, St Peter's Primary School, Epping Primary School, local Greenbrook shops, Westfield Plenty Valley, Epping Plaza Shopping Centre, Epping train station, local bus services and the Epping medical precinct, it's also a location that's ideal for raising a family.
Inside, sparkling timber floorboards add a contemporary flavour to the L-shaped lounge/dining, while sleek benchtops, stainless steel appliances and modern cabinetry provide substance and style to the updated kitchen.
Enjoy summertime BBQs out on the undercover deck that flows onto the large grassed backyard, while three generous-sized bedrooms, an updated fully-tiled bathroom, evaporative cooling, ducted heating, garage with automatic door and plenty of off-street parking enhances the appeal of this excellent first home or smart investment.
Insights: 23 Greenbrook Drive, Epping VIC 3076 was last sold in 2018 and 152 other 3 bedroom house in Epping have recently been sold.

Description:
THROW YOUR ARMS AROUND ME
Street facing, original spacious family home, fully renovated about two years ago. Nothing to do, simply embrace what is on offer & enjoy the refrigerated zoned cooling, central heating, polished boards, stainless steel appliances, BIRs throughout, 10x4m (approx.) huge rear undercover decking, garden shed & more. Low maintenance living with space to grow & entertain. Walk to all amenities including schools, parks, shops + Epping train station. Inspection is sure to impress. Call now.

Description:
STEP INTO THE MARKET
Beautifully positioned facing a leafy park, this low maintenance home offers easy care living for years to come. Featuring 3 generous bedrooms with BIRs, main with walk in robe & bright spacious bathroom. Combined modern living with fully equipped kitchen/meals that flows out to a landscaped courtyard & double remote garage. Ducted heating & vac, evaporative cooling & alarm are just some of the features on offer. Only moments to Pacific Epping & Lyndarum Shopping, schools & transport. This is perfect first home, for those looking to downsize, or investment opportunity. Inspection is certain to impress!

Description:
Enticing Living With Next To No Maintenance
Set Negotiation - Monday 12th November at 6.00pm (Unless Sold Prior)
Get a foothold in the Epping property market without having to sacrifice on style, space and location. Peacefully set at the rear of this desired enclave, this two-storey home delivers an irresistible opportunity. Engineered timber floors enhance a lower level offering generously proportioned open plan living anchored by a stainless steel equipped kitchen and opening to a private astro-turfed courtyard.
A ground floor bedroom complements two first floor bedrooms (one with balcony) served by a pristine family bathroom!
-Opposite parklands and lake
-Auto garage
-Easy access to the bus, school, shops and cafes
-Multiple split system units
-Private astro-turfed courtyard
-Engineered timber floors
-Main bedroom with balcony
Due diligence checklist - for home and residential property buyers
http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Renovated delight!
This immaculately presented family home in a sought after pocket of Epping presents a great opportunity for all home buyers. Set on a 557sqm (appx) block this family home provides an abundance of space, quality fittings and a wealth of natural light. Let the free flowing floor plan guide you through three spacious bedrooms, master with ENS and WIR, sparkling central bathroom, spacious lounge and a stunning renovated kitchen with and s/s appliances adjoining the meals area. With seamless transition from inside to out enjoy the great size undercover entertainment area overlooking a big rear yard perfect for entertaining family and friends all year round. Additional Features include ducted heating, ducted cooling, down lights, quality window furnishings, and renovated laundry with external access. Close to shops, public transport and in numerous school zones, this property is a must see, don't be the one to miss out on this great opportunity.
OFFERS CLOSING BY 15/11/18. UNLESS SOLD PRIOR.

Description:
A PARKSIDE PARADISE FOR FAMILIES IN LYNDARUM ESTATE
With an enviable placement right on Helios Park Reserve, this well-appointed 3 bedroom + study, 2.5 bathroom property is a fantastic example of generous and inviting family living that has all the space you need over two brilliant levels.
With direct access to the green parklands at the front of the property and offering an abundance of places to live and sleep inside, this premier listing will garner much attention. Quality tiled floors and great natural light are hallmarks of both the spacious formal lounge and meals zone, with the latter adjoined by a modern kitchen equipped with and Blanco appliances.
There is a dedicated study upstairs as well as three large bedrooms with BIR which includes the master featuring a beautiful modern large ensuite and his and hers WIR. light-filled bedroom featuring a walk-in robe. All bedrooms have sensational park views and balconies.
This boutique townhouse will leave a lasting impression and offer exceptional family living in the sort after Lydarum Estate.
There is no shortage of places to enjoy outside including a landscaped courtyard with low maintenance garden. Other extras include a separate laundry, ducted heating, rainwater tanks, double garage with 3 way access.
Set in the popular Lyndarum Estate, you are within close proximity to Pacific Epping Shopping Centre, Lyndarum Shopping Complex, Costco, Northern Hospital, Child Care Centres, Junior and Senior Schools and public transport and easy access to freeways.

Description:
Perfect Location on 601m2 approx of Prime Land!
Located in the Hayston Valley Estate, this home comprises of four bedrooms, three with built in robes and wall to wall carpets (main with walk in robe and a full ensuite), multiple living areas which include a family living area, formal lounge, rumpus room and a study, a well appointed kitchen with adjoining meals area, walk in pantry, 900mm stainless steel appliances and dishwasher.
Additional features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, two split systems, downlights, tiles through out, solar panels, 1,000L water tank, security alarm system, laundry with rear access, a spacious bathroom with a separate bath and shower, double car garage with remote control and internal access and a good size backyard with an undercover alfresco with decking. On a substantial parcel of land measuring 601m2 approx with a short drive to Epping Pacific Shopping Centre, Epping Train Station and the Northern Hospital and a short stroll to public transport, Epping Views Primary School and Epping North Shopping Centre, plus so much more. An inspection is a must!

This hidden gem is simply the ideal entry point into the property market. Perfectly suited for first home buyers, investors, young families or the downsizer.
This well-designed unit offers generous space and a versatile layout. Boasting 3 great sized bedrooms with built in robes (master bedroom with ensuite) main bathroom with bathtub & shower, separate lounge, meals area & kitchen with ample storage, evaporative cooling and quality gas appliances and a maintenance free courtyard with pergola.
Ideally located within walking distance to Epping Train station, St Monica's College, Pacific Epping Shopping Centre, Northern Hospital, Epping Primary School, Epping Recreational Reserve, bus stops, local shops, cafes, and restaurants. This location leaves you spoilt for choice.
Offering:
- 3 bedrooms (Main with ensuite)
- 2 Bathrooms Total
- Single car garage with remote control
- Gas Heating
- Evaporative Cooling
- Window Shutters throughout
- Pergola
This is a fantastic opportunity not to be missed, come and inspect today!

Description:
Live the life. Love the lifestyle. Go no further!
Greet dawn on the terrace balconies. Welcome the sun into every corner all day. Find vast views across all North and South that you’ll enjoy with every vibrant sunset. Then say goodnight to the hustle and bustle and just enjoy quality relaxed lifestyle in never before seen level of quality to hit the Epping market place.
Measuring up to 10sqs approximately
Must act NOW only 2 left!!
Exciting brand new development near complete & ready to be lived in before Oct 2018, let 80G light up your life and secure excellent investment and reap the rewards into the future. 80G illuminates inner-city suburban living but also offers affordable option for those looking for something thats modern, naturally lit, innovative & extremely spacious that has emphasis on indoor-outdoor living concept. Beautifully over sized terraces are spacious enough to enjoy BBQ with family & friends, huge open plan dining areas, stone benchtops & s/s kitchen appliances distinctively captivate those looking for something that has emphasis on size & space, architectural designed with beautiful views close to all Epping’s main attractions, shopping plaza, High Street & Epping Train Station. Excellent choice of cafes and restaurants nearby & only 20klm to Melbourne CBD with easy access via short drive to freeway entrance!
For fixtures and fittings schedule, contract & s32 & price list please contact via email or contact us directly at anytime!
